p: The virus is demonstrating how interconnected we are and how much we need each other. A pandemic means that we are all in this together. The forced social isolation and six‐foot distancing has cut us off from intimate contacts and group experiences, making us aware by absence that we are social animals and are important to each other. The ghostly, empty streets in heretofore bustling cities are eerie reminders that our systems are in shock at all levels. Like a nightmare that wakes us in the middle of the night, this shock is meant to shock us into a new consciousness.
